elements.name: YouNeedProtection
elements.title: Do you (and/or your children) need protection from family violence?

elements.name: ThirdPartyApplicant
elements.title: Are you applying on behalf of someone else?
elements.description: Anybody can apply on behalf of an at-risk family of the respondent. Even a police officer, an advocate or a neighbour.

elements.name: ThirdPartyApplicantYes
elements.title: We need your information as the person who is applying, but we also need the information for the person who needs protection.

elements.name: ThirdPartyDOB
elements.title: What is your Date of Birth?

elements.name: question7
elements.title: What if I don't want to use my home address?
elements.body: You don't need to use your home address but you need to be able to served court documents. You can pick a daytime address such as your workplace or a lawyer's address if you have one.

elements.name: ThirdPartyPostalcode
elements.title: Postal Code
elements.placeHolder: Can we have a custom input field for postal code?

elements.name: ApplicantNameNoThirdParty
elements.title: What is your name?
elements.placeHolder: Full name - Is it OK if two questions have the same name?

elements.name: ApplicantNameYesThirdParty
elements.title: What is the name of the person who needs protection?
elements.placeHolder: Is it OK if two questions have the same name?

elements.name: ApplicantDOB
elements.title: What is your Date of Birth?

elements.name: question7
elements.title: What if I don't want to use my home address?
elements.body: You don't need to use your home address but you need to be able to served court documents. You can pick a daytime address such as your workplace or a lawyer's address if you have one.

elements.name: LawyerAddress
elements.title: Is this a lawyer's address?
elements.description: You can use one if you pay your lawyer to send and receive mail for you.

elements.name: applicant.page.end
elements.title: Finished this page. You can add children and other adults later if you need to.

elements.name: Respondent1Name
elements.title: What is the name of the person that {applicant.name} (and/or their children) needs protection from?
elements.placeHolder: Full Name Here If you know it

elements.name: Respondent1IsExPartner
elements.title: Is {respondent1.name} a current or ex-partner of {applicant.name}?

elements.name: Respondent1IsChildsParent
elements.title: Is {respondent1.name} a parent or guardian of any of {applicant.name}'s child?

elements.name: Respondent1IsChildParentsRelative
elements.title: Is {respondent1.name} a relative of {applicant.name}'s child's parent or guardian?

elements.name: Respondent1IsExPartnersPartner
elements.title: Is {respondent1.name} a current partner of {applicant.name}'s ex-partner?

elements.name: Respondent1IsLiveInRelative
elements.title: Is {respondent1.name} a relative of {applicant.name} who lives with {applicant.name}?

elements.name: Respondent1NotFamily
elements.title: {respondent1.name} needs to be a family member of {applicant.name} (or their children). You can't just put in any random citizen. Try a peace bond maybe.

choices.text: I don't know the exact date

elements.name: question7
elements.title: What if I don't know what address to use?
elements.body: You don't need to use {respondent2.name's} home address but you need to be able to served court documents. You can pick a daytime address such as their workplace or somewhere you know {respondent1.name} will be staying.

elements.name: Respondent2Needed
elements.title: Is there anyone else, other than {respondent1.name}, that {applicant} (or their children) needs protection from?

elements.name: Respondent2Name
elements.title: What is the name of the person that {applicant.name} (and/or their children) needs protection from?
elements.placeHolder: Full Name Here If you know it

elements.name: Respondent2IsExPartner
elements.title: Is {respondent2.name} a current or ex-partner of {applicant.name}?

elements.name: Respondent2IsChildsParent
elements.title: Is {respondent2.name} a parent or guardian of any of {applicant.name}'s child?

elements.name: Respondent2IsChildParentsRelative
elements.title: Is {respondent2.name} a relative of {applicant.name}'s child's parent or guardian?

elements.name: Respondent2IsExPartnersPartner
elements.title: Is {respondent2.name} a current partner of {applicant.name}'s ex-partner?

elements.name: Respondent2IsLiveInRelative
elements.title: Is {respondent2.name} a relative of {applicant.name} who lives with {applicant.name}?

elements.name: Respondent2NotFamily
elements.title: {respondent2.name} needs to be a family member of {applicant.name} (or their children). You can't just put in any random citizen. Try a peace bond maybe.

choices.text: I don't know the exact date

elements.name: question15
elements.title: What if I don't know what address to use?
elements.body: You don't need to use {respondent1.name's} home address but you need to be able to served court documents. You can pick a daytime address such as their workplace or somewhere you know {respondent1.name} will be staying.

elements.name: Respondent3Needed
elements.title: Is there anyone else, other than {respondent1.name} and {respondent2.name} that {applicant} (or their children) needs protection from?

elements.name: ChildrenAmount
elements.title: What is the total amount of children that have {applicant} and {respondent1} have?

choices.text: I don't know {child1.name}'s exact date of birth but I know they are 19 or older
I don't know {child1.name}'s exact date of birth but I know they are younger than 19

elements.name: Child1IsAdult
elements.title: {child1.name} is considered an adult. For the purposes of this service, we need to ask additional questions about their care, we need to know who they are living with etc..

choices.text: I don't know {child2.name}'s exact date of birth but I know they are 19 or older
I don't know {child2.name}'s exact date of birth but I know they are younger than 19

elements.name: Child2IsAdult
elements.title: {child2.name} is considered an adult. For the purposes of this service, we need to ask additional questions about their care, we need to know who they are living with etc..

elements.name: Child2RelationshipsSame
elements.title: Are {child2}'s relationship to {applicant} and {respondent1}, {respondent2} the same as {child1}?

elements.name: Child1OtherGuardiansAmount
elements.title: How many other guardians does {child1.name} have?

elements.name: Child2OtherGuardiansAmount
elements.title: How many other guardians does {child2.name} have?

pages.name: P Time

elements.name: Child1EqualPTime
elements.title: Does {child1} spend time equally between [GuardianX] and [GuardianY]?
elements.description: Visible If {child1} spends time with more than 1 Guardian

elements.name: Child1MainGuardians
elements.title: Which guardian(s) does Child1 spend the most time with?

elements.name: Child1UnequalPTime
elements.title: How much time does [Unequal GuardianX] spend with {child1.name}?
elements.description: Display this question for each guardian not selected in above question

choices.text: More than twice a week [generous and liberal]

elements.name: Child2PTimeSame
elements.title: Is the amount of time that {child1.name}'s guardians spend with {child1.name} the same for {child2.name}?

pages.title: Parenting Time
pages.description: This page displays if there are any children with more than 1 guardian

elements.name: question20
elements.title: Is there an agreement or court order respecting this contact?

elements.name: question21
elements.title: What kind of contact does {applicant.name} have with {child1.name}?

choices.text: as agreed upon to between {applicant.name} and {respondent1.name}
supervised contact/in presence of someone else

elements.name: question10
question22
elements.title: Who needs to be on the FLA Protection Order from {respondent1.name}?

elements.name: question9
elements.title: Are there any other family members of {applicant.name} (, {child1.name} or {child2.name}) who need protection from {respondent1.name}?

choices.text: I don't know the exact date
family member of one of the children
I don't know the exact date
family member of one of the children

elements.name: question23
elements.title: Does {respondent1.name} currently live with any of [names of pending protect parties]?
elements.description: we'll need lots of info here or expanding question topic about what it means to "currently live" with someone. in other words, ran away to a shelter/couch surfing vs moved out a month ago. FLA 184(4)

elements.name: question26
elements.title: Does anyone want to stay in the family home?

elements.name: question25
elements.title: Do you think you need the police to remove [respondent1] from where [applicants/children] live or are they leaving on their own?

choices.text: {respondent1.name} will probably leave on their own

elements.name: panel5
elements.title: What is the address of the family home?

elements.name: question24
elements.title: Does {respondent1.name} have any of [list of pending protected parties]'s personal belongings?

elements.name: question27
elements.title: Do you think you need the police assistance to get personal belongings from {respondent1.name}?

elements.name: panel6
question40
elements.title: Postal Code
elements.placeHolder: Can we have a custom input field for postal code?

elements.title: What is the address of the family home?

elements.name: question28
elements.title: Does [names of pending protected parties] have any {respondent1.name}'s personal belongings?
elements.description: Leave out the stolen items. make the help text more about clothing and daily-needed items. the whole point is to avoid having to come back and forth to grab stuff each time.

elements.name: question43
elements.title: Do you think you need the police to accompany you to remove personal belongings from where {respondent1.name} lives?

elements.name: panel7
question50
elements.title: Postal Code
elements.placeHolder: Can we have a custom input field for postal code?

elements.title: What is the address of the family home?

elements.name: question44
elements.title: Would {respondent1.name} need to contact you for ongoing court thing?
elements.description: Even with a No Contact order, there may be times where it is important to contact each for certain purposes.

elements.name: question52
elements.title: Is there any third parties that {respondent1.name} and {applicant} you can communicate through?

elements.name: question54
elements.title: Does {respondent1.name} need to contact {appliant.name} to arrange parentingtime/childcare/etc

elements.name: question56
elements.title: Any other reason that {respondent1.name} would need to contact {applicant}?

elements.name: question58
elements.title: Are there any places where [respondent] needs to stay away from?

elements.name: question59
elements.title: Are you afraid [Respondent] will harm you or family members with weapons (including guns, explosives)?

elements.name: question60
elements.title: By selecting no above, you are saying there is no need for a judge to order [respondent] to give up their weapons if they have any. They also won't be able to possess any weapons for the duraction of this protection order. If there is no concern over weapons, hit "there is no concern over weapons" Otherwise, consider going back to the last question and selecting 'yes' instead.

elements.name: question61
elements.title: Do you think [Respondent1] have guns, explosives or something?

elements.name: question62
elements.title: Does you think [Respondent1] have weapons that are not guns, explosives?

elements.name: question63
elements.title: This is a review of everything. Show the box and show summary. Edit button to go back to topic page.

elements.name: question64
elements.title: Protection Orders usually last 1 year from the date the judge makes the order. Do you wish to make the order last a different amount of time?

elements.name: question65
elements.title: What date do you think the POR should expire?
elements.description: You will need to explain to the judge why you think this new date matters.

elements.name: question66
elements.title: Do you need [Respondent1] to carry a copy of this order (if it is granted) on their person at all times for the duration of order.

elements.name: question67
elements.title: Tell someone they finish the form. This is what it looks like. Here's next steps. By the way, urgency questions

elements.name: question68
elements.title: Do you feel you need this protection order sooner?

elements.name: question69
elements.title: How soon do you need this protection order?

elements.title: Q1 What Happened? (This stuff should not be saved into the database)
